abstracts.cdata!:
The main objective of the project is to
            restore hospital operations in the seven hospitals most
            damaged by the earthquakes (component I) and improve the
            health status of the most vulnerable population living in
            the central, para-central and northern regions of El
            Salvador (Components II, III and IV). The project intends to
            fulfill these goals by: (i) rebuilding damaged hospitals;
            (ii) extending coverage of basic health care and nutrition
            services through community participation; and (iii)
            strengthening the MOHs institutional capacity to develop
            and implement health care policies and programs.
